items.title: A Corner Coffeeshop
items.description: An example use case of a local coffee shop, showcasing Loyal's easy of use for small to medium size companies.

items.title: Railway modelling
items.description: A use case of a niche market - Railway modelling - that can use a web3 based points program to connect local shops globally.

items.title: Shopping Street
items.description: An example where a web3 loyalty program such as Loyal can be used to facilitates coordination among multiple shops in the same locale.
